titles: An expostulation with Thomas Lloyd, Samuell Jenings, and the rest of the twenty eight unjust judges and signers of the paper of condemnation against George Keith and the rest of his Friends, and complaint for a publick hearing and tryal before all impartial people
author: Budd, Thomas, 1648-1699.
notes: Signed: Thomas Budd, Richard Hilliard, William Bradford, and others.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
